TopicTitle: New Contracts and New Agent: Kerbal Airlines

Articles.Content: I want a contract that is to design an aircraft which can transport a number of Kerbal passengers a certain distance over air and land safely, all the while being one-stage. The goal of the contract is to DESIGN and sell a commercial airliner. Later in the game, I would like to see a space tourism contract from Kerbal Airlines. The Spacecraft will be restricted to a certain gee-force and any more than that Gee-Force and the mission will fail. Additionally these Kerbals will not produce control. Space Tourist Kerbals will be selected from the Crew tab and they will have a blue/cyan tab instead of grey, similar to experimental parts. They will also wear the recruit-style jumpsuit while in flight and on EVA, and will die if they EVA without the right air.

I think space tourists should be able to eva, its a game afterall, no insurance companies to stop them

but along these lines, there could be a contract to bring a vip to a base, provided the game sees you have a base on a body somewhere, or to a station.
